title: 2.21 Battle for the New Testament I: Earliest Times
itunes:title: Battle for the New Testament I: Earliest Times
description: Christians in the first two centuries did not have a sacred canon of books. In this first of four parts, I discuss what the earliest church fathers Clement, Ignatius, Polycarp and Papias were reading. Marcion spurred the Jesus-clubs into action.
content:encoded: Christians in the first two centuries did not have a sacred canon of books. In this first of four parts, I discuss what the earliest church fathers Clement, Ignatius, Polycarp and Papias were reading. Marcion spurred the Jesus-clubs into action.
itunes:subtitle: Early Christians battled to build library of sacred books.
itunes:author: Garry Stevens
